articles.summary: Barrons.com: Fidelity Contrafund’s Will Danoff Is Getting Closer to Handing Off the Reins. The legendary manager has taken on two co-managers to help him run the mammoth fund. Just don’t use the word “retirement.” Related tickers mentioned: AAPL, AMZN, BRK-B, MCD, META.

articles.summary: StockStory: 2 S&P 500 Stocks Worth Investigating and 1 We Avoid. While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds. Related tickers mentioned: COIN, LII, ^GSPC.

articles.title: Q3 Research Tools & Consumables Earnings: Sotera Health Company (NASDAQ:SHC) Earns Top Marks

articles.summary: StockStory: Q3 Research Tools & Consumables Earnings: Sotera Health Company (NASDAQ:SHC) Earns Top Marks. As the craze of earnings season draws to a close, here’s a look back at some of the most exciting (and some less so) results from Q3. Today, we are looking at research tools & consumables stocks, starting with Sotera Health Company (NASDAQ:SHC). Related tickers mentioned: SHC.
